title: 26: Technology for Health Promoting Behavior
dc:creator: mad hat pod
description: We are joined by Professor Dan Connors of University of Colorado Denver to discuss his research on leveraging technology to increase efficiency in the healthcare system specifically in regards to fighting the opioid epidemic in the US.  He also talks with us about using internet of things technology to promote better personal health.  Hosted by Ceren Karacasu, Yudong Rao, Elaine Qiu and David Just.
